name: Alchemical Circles
description:
Short incremental game built for the Summer Incremental Game Jam 2022.

Estimated play time: 10 minutes.

Develop new alchemical transmutations by drawing circles with the necessary materials. Master previous recipes and get more and more complex circles until you find eternal fortune by transmuting gold.

Game was built to try two mechanics/tools in an incremental setting: drawing and a tree structure.
